/* [chn.bhmc.dms.ser.svi.service.dao.CampaignVinManageDAO.insertUsedCamapaignInfo] */
MERGE INTO SE_1076T A USING( SELECT B.DLR_CD --딜러코드 ,B.CR_NO --캠페인리콜번호 ,B.LBR_CD --공임코드 ,A.VIN_NO --차대번호 ,B.CR_TP --캠페인리콜유형 ,B.REG_USR_ID --등록자ID ,B.REG_DT --등록일자 ,'N' DEL_YN --삭제여부 ,A.RO_DOC_NO --RO 문서번호 FROM SE_0300T A , SE_0170T B WHERE A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.RO_DOC_NO = B.DOC_NO AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND B.PREFIX_ID ='RO' AND A.RO_DOC_NO = #{sRoDocNo} AND A.RO_STAT_CD != '06' AND B.CR_NO IS NOT NULL )B ON ( A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.CR_NO = B.CR_NO AND A.LBR_CD = B.LBR_CD AND A.VIN_NO = B.VIN_NO ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.CR_TP = B.CR_TP ,A.UPDT_USR_ID = #{sRegUseId} ,A.UPDT_DT = SYSDATE ,A.DEL_YN = B.DEL_YN ,A.RO_DOC_NO = B.RO_DOC_NO WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.DLR_CD ,A.CR_NO ,A.LBR_CD ,A.VIN_NO ,A.CR_TP ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_DT ,A.DEL_YN ,A.RO_DOC_NO )VALUES( B.DLR_CD ,B.CR_NO ,B.LBR_CD ,B.VIN_NO ,B.CR_TP ,#{sRegUseId} ,SYSDATE ,B.DEL_YN ,B.RO_DOC_NO );
mapper.select:
/* [chn.bhmc.dms.ser.svi.service.dao.CampaignVinManageDAO.selectCampaignVinInfosCnt] */
SELECT COUNT(CR_NO) AS VALUE FROM ( SELECT B.CR_NO , B.VIN_NO , '' LTS_MODEL_CD , '' LTS_MODEL_NM , B.USE_YN , B.DLR_CD , B.USE_DT FROM SE_1073T B WHERE B.CR_NO = #{sCrNo} UNION SELECT A.CR_NO , '' VIN_NO , A.LTS_MODEL_CD , (SELECT
LTS_EN_NM LTS_CHN_NM LTS_EN_NM
FROM SE_1064T WHERE LTS_MODEL_CD = A.LTS_MODEL_CD) AS LTS_MODEL_NM , '' AS USE_YN , '' AS DLR_CD , NULL AS USE_DT FROM SE_1074T A WHERE A.CR_NO = #{sCrNo} )

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.ser.svi.service.dao.CampaignVinManageDAO.selectCampaignForVinInfos] */
SELECT T1.CR_NO ,T1.CR_TP ,T1.CR_NM ,T1.CR_START_DT ,T1.CR_END_DT FROM ( SELECT E.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY E.CR_NO , E.CR_TP ORDER BY E.CR_NO , E.CR_TP DESC ) AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.MAK_CD AS CR_NO ,A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AS CR_TP ,A.MAK_NM AS CR_NM ,A.START_DT AS CR_START_DT ,A.END_DT AS CR_END_DT FROM CR_0701T A, SE_1073T B , SE_1072T C WHERE A.MAK_CD = B.CR_NO AND C.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD
-- AND A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD NOT IN ('K','T','V') -- PDI 인경우
AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT AND A.CR_END_TP = 'N' AND A.HOST_CD = #{sHostCd} --주최코드 (CRM)법인 : 01 , 딜러 : 02 AND A.MAK_TP_CD = '03' --마케팅유형코드(CRM) AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.STAT_CD = '03' AND B.VIN_NO = #{sVinNo} AND C.DLR_CD = A.DLR_CD AND (A.PC_DSTIN_CD IS NULL OR A.PC_DSTIN_CD = #{sCarDstinCd} ) -- 승용 : P , TAXI : C AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT DLR_CD ,CR_NO ,VIN_NO --,LBR_CD ,CR_TP FROM SE_1076T WHERE CR_NO = A.MAK_CD --AND LBR_CD = C.LBR_CD AND VIN_NO = B.VIN_NO AND CR_TP = A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT R.DLR_CD ,R.RO_DOC_NO --,L.LBR_CD ,L.CR_NO ,L.CR_TP FROM SE_0300T R , SE_0170T L WHERE R.DLR_CD = L.DLR_CD AND R.RO_DOC_NO = L.DOC_NO AND R.RO_TP = L.RO_TP AND L.PREFIX_ID = 'RO' AND R.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND R.RO_STAT_CD != '06' AND L.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD --AND L.LBR_CD = C.LBR_CD AND L.CR_TP = A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AND R.VIN_NO = B.VIN_NO ) UNION ALL SELECT A.MAK_CD AS CR_NO ,A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AS CR_TP ,A.MAK_NM AS CR_NM ,A.START_DT AS CR_START_DT ,A.END_DT AS CR_END_DT FROM CR_0701T A , SE_1074T B , SE_1072T C WHERE A.MAK_CD = B.CR_NO AND (B.LTS_MODEL_CD = #{sLtsModelCd} OR B.LTS_MODEL_CD = 'ALL') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT -- 캠페인적용일자
AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR( #{sSignOffDt} ,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(CRE_START_DT,TO_DATE('19990101','YYYYMMDD')) AND NVL(CRE_END_DT, TO_DATE('29991231','YYYYMMDD')) -- 생산일자
AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR( NVL(#{sCustSaleDt},SYSDATE ) ,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(SALE_START_DT,TO_DATE('19990101','YYYYMMDD')) AND NVL(SALE_END_DT, TO_DATE('29991231','YYYYMMDD'))-- 판매일자
AND (A.PC_DSTIN_CD IS NULL OR A.PC_DSTIN_CD = #{sCarDstinCd} ) -- 승용 : P , TAXI : C AND A.CR_END_TP = 'N' AND A.HOST_CD = #{sHostCd} --주최코드 (CRM)법인 : 01 , 딜러 : 02 AND A.MAK_TP_CD = '03' --마케팅유형코드(CRM) AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.STAT_CD = '03' AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND C.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD AND C.DLR_CD = A.DLR_CD AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT R.DLR_CD ,R.RO_DOC_NO --,L.LBR_CD ,L.CR_NO ,L.CR_TP FROM SE_0300T R , SE_0170T L WHERE R.DLR_CD = L.DLR_CD AND R.RO_DOC_NO = L.DOC_NO AND R.RO_TP = L.RO_TP AND L.PREFIX_ID = 'RO' AND R.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND R.RO_STAT_CD != '06' AND L.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD --AND L.LBR_CD = C.LBR_CD AND L.CR_TP = A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AND R.VIN_NO = #{sVinNo} ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT DLR_CD ,CR_NO ,VIN_NO --,LBR_CD ,CR_TP FROM SE_1076T WHERE CR_NO = A.MAK_CD --AND LBR_CD = C.LBR_CD AND CR_TP = A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AND VIN_NO = #{sVinNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) )E )T1 WHERE RN = 1

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.ser.svi.service.dao.CampaignVinManageDAO.selectCampaignForVinInfosCnt] */
SELECT COUNT(1) VALUE FROM ( SELECT E.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY E.CR_NO , E.CR_TP ORDER BY E.CR_NO , E.CR_TP DESC ) AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.MAK_CD AS CR_NO ,A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AS CR_TP ,A.MAK_NM AS CR_NM ,A.START_DT AS CR_START_DT ,A.END_DT AS CR_END_DT FROM CR_0701T A, SE_1073T B , SE_1072T C WHERE A.MAK_CD = B.CR_NO AND C.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD AND A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND B.DLR_CD = C.DLR_CD
-- AND A.A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD NOT IN ('K','T','V') -- PDI 인경우
AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT AND A.CR_END_TP = 'N' AND A.HOST_CD = #{sHostCd} --주최코드 (CRM)법인 : 01 , 딜러 : 02 AND A.MAK_TP_CD = '03' --마케팅유형코드(CRM) AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.VIN_NO = #{sVinNo} AND (A.PC_DSTIN_CD IS NULL OR A.PC_DSTIN_CD = #{sCarDstinCd} ) -- 승용 : P , TAXI : C AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT DLR_CD ,CR_NO ,VIN_NO --,LBR_CD ,CR_TP FROM SE_1076T WHERE CR_NO = A.MAK_CD --AND LBR_CD = C.LBR_CD AND VIN_NO = B.VIN_NO AND CR_TP = A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT R.DLR_CD ,R.RO_DOC_NO --,L.LBR_CD ,L.CR_NO ,L.CR_TP FROM SE_0300T R , SE_0170T L WHERE R.DLR_CD = L.DLR_CD AND R.RO_DOC_NO = L.DOC_NO AND R.RO_TP = L.RO_TP AND L.PREFIX_ID = 'RO' AND R.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND R.RO_STAT_CD != '06' AND L.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD --AND L.LBR_CD = C.LBR_CD AND L.CR_TP = A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AND R.VIN_NO = B.VIN_NO ) UNION ALL SELECT A.MAK_CD AS CR_NO ,A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AS CR_TP ,A.MAK_NM AS CR_NM ,A.START_DT AS CR_START_DT ,A.END_DT AS CR_END_DT FROM CR_0701T A , SE_1074T B , SE_1072T C WHERE A.MAK_CD = B.CR_NO AND A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND B.DLR_CD = C.DLR_CD AND (B.LTS_MODEL_CD = #{sLtsModelCd} OR B.LTS_MODEL_CD = 'ALL') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT -- 캠페인적용일자
AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR( #{sSignOffDt} ,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(CRE_START_DT,TO_DATE('19990101','YYYYMMDD')) AND NVL(CRE_END_DT, TO_DATE('29991231','YYYYMMDD')) -- 생산일자
AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR( NVL(#{sCustSaleDt},SYSDATE ) ,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(SALE_START_DT,TO_DATE('19990101','YYYYMMDD')) AND NVL(SALE_END_DT, TO_DATE('29991231','YYYYMMDD'))-- 판매일자
AND (A.PC_DSTIN_CD IS NULL OR A.PC_DSTIN_CD = #{sCarDstinCd} ) -- 승용 : P , TAXI : C AND A.CR_END_TP = 'N' AND A.HOST_CD = #{sHostCd} --주최코드 (CRM)법인 : 01 , 딜러 : 02 AND A.MAK_TP_CD = '03' --마케팅유형코드(CRM) AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND C.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT R.DLR_CD ,R.RO_DOC_NO --,L.LBR_CD ,L.CR_NO ,L.CR_TP FROM SE_0300T R , SE_0170T L WHERE R.DLR_CD = L.DLR_CD AND R.RO_DOC_NO = L.DOC_NO AND R.RO_TP = L.RO_TP AND L.PREFIX_ID = 'RO' AND R.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND R.RO_STAT_CD != '06' AND L.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD --AND L.LBR_CD = C.LBR_CD AND L.CR_TP = A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT DLR_CD ,CR_NO ,VIN_NO --,LBR_CD ,CR_TP FROM SE_1076T WHERE CR_NO = A.MAK_CD --AND LBR_CD = C.LBR_CD AND CR_TP = A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AND VIN_NO = #{sVinNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N' ) )E )T1 WHERE RN =1

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.ser.svi.service.dao.CampaignVinManageDAO.selectCampaignDlrLbrInfoPopup] */
SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,B.CR_NO ,A.HOST_CD ,CASE WHEN A.HOST_CD ='01' THEN 'H' ELSE 'D' END DSTIN_CD ,A.MAK_NM AS CR_NM ,B.LBR_CD ,B.LBR_TP ,B.CR_TP ,B.LBR_NM ,B.LBR_QTY ,B.CAU_ITEM_CD ,B.CAU_ITEM_NM ,B.CAU_CD ,B.CAU_NM ,B.PHEN_CD ,B.PHEN_NM ,B.LBR_HM ,B.LBR_PRC ,B.LBR_AMT ,NVL(B.DS_AMT ,0) AS DC_AMT ,NVL(B.DS_RATE,0) AS DC_RATE ,NVL(B.LBR_TOT_AMT ,0 ) AS LBR_TOT_AMT FROM CR_0701T A , SE_1072T B , ( SELECT CR_NO , LBR_CD FROM ( SELECT B.CR_NO , B.LBR_CD FROM CR_0701T A , SE_1072T B WHERE A.MAK_CD = B.CR_NO AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.CR_NO = #{sCrNo} AND A.CR_END_TP = 'N' AND A.HOST_CD = #{sHostCd} AND A.MAK_TP_CD = '03' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} MINUS SELECT B.CR_NO , B.LBR_CD FROM CR_0701T A, SE_1076T B WHERE A.MAK_CD = B.CR_NO AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT AND B.VIN_NO = #{sVinNo} AND B.CR_NO = #{sCrNo} AND A.CR_END_TP = 'N' AND A.HOST_CD = #{sHostCd} AND A.MAK_TP_CD = '03' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' ) ) C WHERE A.MAK_CD = B.CR_NO AND A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND A.MAK_CD = #{sCrNo} AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.CR_NO = C.CR_NO AND B.LBR_CD = C.LBR_CD AND A.CR_END_TP = 'N' AND A.HOST_CD = #{sHostCd} AND A.MAK_TP_CD = '03' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT CR_NO FROM SE_0300T R1 , SE_0170T R2 WHERE R1.DLR_CD = R2.DLR_CD AND R1.RO_DOC_NO = R2.DOC_NO AND R1.RO_TP = R2.RO_TP AND R2.PREFIX_ID = 'RO' AND R2.CR_NO IS NOT NULL AND R1.RO_STAT_CD != '06' AND R2.CR_NO = B.CR_NO AND R2.LBR_CD = B.LBR_CD AND R1.VIN_NO = #{sVinNo} ) ORDER BY B.LBR_CD ASC

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.ser.svi.service.dao.CampaignVinManageDAO.selectCampaignPartInfoPopup] */
SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.CR_NO ,A.HOST_CD ,A.CR_TP ,A.CR_NM ,A.LBR_CD ,A.ITEM_CD ,NVL(A.ITEM_NM ,B.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM ,A.ITEM_QTY AS GI_QTY ,B.STOCK_UNIT_CD ,ROUND(NVL(SALE_PRC_AMT,0),2) AS SALE_PRC_AMT ,ROUND(NVL(TAX_DDCT_GRTE_PRC,0),2) AS TAX_DDCT_GRTE_PRC ,ROUND(MOVING_AVG_PRC,2) AS MOVING_AVG_PRC ,B.GR_STRGE_CD ,B.GI_STRGE_CD FROM ( SELECT A.MAK_CD AS CR_NO ,A.HOST_CD ,A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AS CR_TP ,A.MAK_NM AS CR_NM ,B.LBR_CD ,C.ITEM_CD ,C.ITEM_NM ,C.ITEM_QTY FROM CR_0701T A , SE_1072T B , SE_1071T C WHERE A.MAK_CD = B.CR_NO AND A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND B.DLR_CD = C.DLR_CD AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND A.MAK_CD = #{sCrNo} AND B.LBR_CD = #{sLbrCd} AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD AND C.LBR_CD = B.LBR_CD AND A.CR_END_TP = 'N' AND A.HOST_CD = #{sHostCd} --주최코드 (CRM) 법인 : 01 , 딜러 : 02 AND A.MAK_TP_CD = '03' --마케팅유형코드(CRM) AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND (C.LTS_MODEL_CD = ' ' OR C.LTS_MODEL_CD = #{sLtsModelCd} ) )A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITEM_CD ,ITEM_NM ,ITEM_EN_NM ,STOCK_UNIT_CD ,GR_STRGE_CD ,GI_STRGE_CD ,NVL( (SELECT MOVING_AVG_PRC FROM PT_0208T WHERE DLR_CD = A.DLR_CD AND STRGE_CD = A.GI_STRGE_CD AND ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD AND ROWNUM = 1 ) , NVL(A.MOVING_AVG_PRC,0)) AS MOVING_AVG_PRC ,NVL( (SELECT NVL(TAX_DDCT_GRTE_PRC, 0) AS TAX_DDCT_GRTE_PRC FROM PT_0214T WHERE DLR_CD = A.DLR_CD AND ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD AND PRC_TP = '01' AND APPLY_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ,0) AS TAX_DDCT_GRTE_PRC ,NVL( (SELECT NVL(GRTE_PRC, 0) AS SALE_PRC_AMT FROM PT_0214T WHERE DLR_CD = A.DLR_CD AND ITEM_CD = A.ITEM_CD AND PRC_TP = '01' AND APPLY_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1) ,0) AS SALE_PRC_AMT FROM PT_0201T A WHERE DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} --AND ITEM_DSTIN_CD = '02' AND END_YN = 'N' AND SPYR_CD = '01' AND BRAND_CD = DECODE(#{sCarBrandCd}, 'N', 'HD', 'OT') )B ON A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD ORDER BY A.LBR_CD ASC )T1

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.ser.svi.service.dao.CampaignVinManageDAO.selectCampaignPartInfoPopup] */
SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , T1.GI_QTY*T1.SALE_PRC_AMT AS ITEM_TOT_AMT , T1.SALE_PRC_AMT AS ITEM_PRC , T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.CR_NO ,A.HOST_CD ,A.CR_TP ,A.CR_NM ,A.LBR_CD ,A.ITEM_CD ,NVL(A.ITEM_NM ,B.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM ,A.ITEM_QTY AS GI_QTY ,B.STOCK_UNIT_CD ,B.GR_STRGE_CD ,B.GI_STRGE_CD ,ROUND( NVL( (SELECT MOVING_AVG_PRC FROM PT_0208T WHERE DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND STRGE_CD = B.GI_STRGE_CD AND ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND ROWNUM = 1 ) , NVL(B.MOVING_AVG_PRC,0) ) ,2) AS MOVING_AVG_PRC ,ROUND( NVL( (SELECT NVL(TAX_DDCT_GRTE_PRC, 0) AS TAX_DDCT_GRTE_PRC FROM PT_0214T WHERE DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND PRC_TP = '01' AND APPLY_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ,0) ,2) AS TAX_DDCT_GRTE_PRC ,ROUND( NVL( (SELECT NVL(GRTE_PRC, 0) AS SALE_PRC_AMT FROM PT_0214T WHERE DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND PRC_TP = '01' AND APPLY_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ,0) ,2)AS SALE_PRC_AMT FROM ( SELECT A.MAK_CD AS CR_NO ,A.HOST_CD ,A.MAK_SUB_TP_CD AS CR_TP ,A.MAK_NM AS CR_NM ,B.LBR_CD ,C.ITEM_CD ,C.ITEM_NM ,C.ITEM_QTY ,A.DLR_CD FROM CR_0701T A , SE_1072T B , SE_1071T C WHERE A.MAK_CD = B.CR_NO AND A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND B.DLR_CD = C.DLR_CD AND A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND A.MAK_CD = #{sCrNo} AND B.LBR_CD = #{sLbrCd} AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.START_DT AND A.END_DT AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.CR_NO = A.MAK_CD AND C.LBR_CD = B.LBR_CD AND A.CR_END_TP = 'N' AND A.HOST_CD = #{sHostCd} --주최코드 (CRM) 법인 : 01 , 딜러 : 02 AND A.MAK_TP_CD = '03' --마케팅유형코드(CRM) AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND (C.LTS_MODEL_CD = ' ' OR C.LTS_MODEL_CD = #{sLtsModelCd} ) )A LEFT OUTER JOIN PT_0201T B ON A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD WHERE B.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} --AND ITEM_DSTIN_CD = '02' AND B.END_YN = 'N' AND B.SPYR_CD = '01' AND B.BRAND_CD = DECODE(#{sCarBrandCd}, 'N', 'HD', 'OT') ORDER BY A.LBR_CD ASC ) T1
